experience.title: Senior Developer
description: Work primarily with all of our outward facing code base. Focusing on our client interface along with writing our pixel code to work cross browser (back to IE6).

experience.title: Project Manager, Senior Developer
description: Working with customers directly to manage expectations and handle any issues while also delegating objectives to fellow developers.
Created web based solutions of various sizes. From small Facebook page tabs and email blasts to full fledged Magento shopping carts.
The back end of projects are done on Linux/Debian servers using nginx, PHP5.4+, MySQL, and an in-house MVC framework for custom projects.
Front end consists of HTML5/CSS with jQuery for interactions.

experience.title: Developer
description: Developed both the back and front end frameworks used by the rest of the development team at Lafango. Also developed different systems of the site.
Also developed the way AJAX works from front to back. Back end generates JSON in PHP via REST calls while the front end parsing was built using jQuery (previously Prototype).
